author: geirm
msg: For convertion from Configuration to ExtendedProperties, added a 'shadow' ExtendedProperties
in o.a.v.apps.Velocity, there is a method setConfiguration() that we want to
deprecate.  The only way to do this would be to take the Configuration,
copy all data out and into an ExtendedProperties, and then init
the Runtime with that.  Now, that's not easy w/o modifying the EP to
support that (I think), so the easiest was to shadow like this.
I don't think anyone except turbine uses this anyway, and turbine will change

author: geirm
msg: Converted from Configuration to ExtendedProperties.  Should be no functional
change other than the deprecated setConfiguration() method.

author: geirm
msg: Stopped flushing and closing the output stream, because it prevents us from
playing nicely with others. (For example, our JSP bretheren cannot do a
<jsp:include> and invoke a Velocity-based servlet.... baby steps...).
The container is supposed to manage this anyway, so there shouldn't be a problem.
If there is (try this in the various containers...) and we can deal, but there
shouldn't be a problem. I ran this by Craig, and he confirmed.
